zh_title: 律政司澄清有關宵禁的謠言

en: In response to an online forum saying that the Secretary for Justice has discussed with lawyers on the legal consequences and the corresponding measures of a curfew on several occasions, a spokesman for the Department of Justice today (October 8) clarified that the allegations were totally fabricated and unfounded.
zh: 就網上討論區有傳言指律政司司長與法律界人士曾多次討論宵禁的法律後果和應對措施，律政司發言人今日（十月八日）表示有關傳聞純屬捏造，毫無事實根據。

en: In response to an online forum saying that the Secretary for Justice has discussed with lawyers on the legal consequences and the corresponding measures of a curfew on several occasions, a spokesman for the Department of Justice today (October 8) clarified that the allegations were totally fabricated and unfounded.
